name: Booking
description: This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world to create a travel site such as : booking.com

parameters.name: hotel_ids
parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

parameters.name: languagecode
parameters.description: One of the followings : en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

api_methods.name: review-filters/list
api_methods.description: List supported options metadata for filtering reviews

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

parameters.name: languagecode
parameters.description: One of the followings : en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

parameters.name: filter_language
parameters.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values): en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

parameters.name: filter_customer_type
parameters.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values) : couple|family_with_children|review_category_group_of_friends|solo_traveller

parameters.name: user_sort
parameters.description: One of the followings : sort_most_relevant|sort_recent_desc|sort_recent_asc|sort_score_desc|sort_score_asc

api_methods.name: filters/list
api_methods.description: A list of filter options to pass in categories_filter field. Pass params and values are as same as .../properties/list API

parameters.name: room_qty
parameters.description: The number of rooms

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: The check-out date

parameters.name: dest_ids
parameters.description: Value of dest_id or city_ufi field from locations/auto-complete API (Don't pass this if you use latlong as search_type)

constraints.inter-dependency: dest_ids, search_type: dest_ids should not be passed if search_type is 'latlong'.

parameters.name: guest_qty
parameters.description: The number of adults

parameters.name: arrival_date
parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Value of dest_type returned by locations/auto-complete API

parameters.name: languagecode
parameters.description: One of the followings : en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

parameters.name: categories_filter
parameters.description: The id returned by .../filters/list API

parameters.name: children_qty
parameters.description: The number of children

parameters.name: children_age
parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: 106.686102 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

constraints.inter-dependency: longitude, search_type: longitude should not be passed if search_type is not 'latlong'.

parameters.name: price_filter_currencycode
parameters.description: The base currency to calculate exchange rate

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: 10.838039 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

constraints.inter-dependency: latitude, search_type: latitude should not be passed if search_type is not 'latlong'.

api_methods.name: properties/detail
api_methods.description: Get brief information of a property

parameters.name: rec_room_qty
parameters.description: The number of rooms

parameters.name: search_id
parameters.description: The value returned in properties/list API having response contains the selected hotel

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: The check-out date

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

parameters.name: rec_guest_qty
parameters.description: The number of adults separated by comma, and how you arrange them in rooms

parameters.name: arrival_date
parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel

parameters.name: block_ids
parameters.description: The value of 'block_ids' field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

parameters.name: dest_ids
parameters.description: The value of 'dest_id' field returned in .../locations/auto-complete endpoint

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: One of the following : metric|imperial

parameters.name: currency_code
parameters.description: The currency code

parameters.name: rec_children_qty
parameters.description: The number of children separated by comma, and how you arrange them in rooms

parameters.name: recommend_for
parameters.description: The recommended number of persons per room

parameters.name: rec_children_age
parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma. Ex : 5,7

parameters.name: languagecode
parameters.description: One of the followings : en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

api_methods.name: properties/list-by-map
api_methods.description: List properties by coordinate of bounding box

parameters.name: arrival_date
parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-14

parameters.name: room_qty
parameters.description: The number of rooms

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: The check-out date, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-15

parameters.name: guest_qty
parameters.description: The number of adults

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Coordinate of bounding box - latitude (bottom left),latitude (top right),longitude (bottom left),longitude (top right)

parameters.name: travel_purpose
parameters.description: One of the followings : leisure|business

parameters.name: categories_filter
parameters.description: The id returned by .../filters/list API, values separated by comma

parameters.name: children_qty
parameters.description: The number of children

parameters.name: search_id
parameters.description: Pass \\\"none\\\" or value returned right in this API

parameters.name: children_age
parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma

parameters.name: price_filter_currencycode
parameters.description: The base currency to calculate exchange rate

parameters.name: languagecode
parameters.description: One of the followings : en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: One of the followings : popularity|distance|class_descending|class_ascending|deals|review_score|price

api_methods.name: properties/list
api_methods.description: List properties having type of resorts, hotels, motels, hostels, etc as on official site

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to ignore as offset for paging (fixed 30 items returned per page). You are interested in the optional parameter 'search_id'

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: The check-out date, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-15

parameters.name: room_qty
parameters.description: The number of rooms

parameters.name: guest_qty
parameters.description: The number of adults

parameters.name: arrival_date
parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-14

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Value of dest_type returned by locations/auto-complete API

parameters.name: dest_ids
parameters.description: Value of dest_id or city_ufi field from locations/auto-complete API (Don't pass this if you use latlong as search_type)

constraints.inter-dependency: dest_ids, search_type: dest_ids must not be provided if search_type is 'latlong'.

parameters.name: price_filter_currencycode
parameters.description: The base currency to calculate exchange rate

parameters.name: travel_purpose
parameters.description: One of the followings : leisure|business

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: 10.838039 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

constraints.inter-dependency: latitude, search_type: latitude must not be provided if search_type is not 'latlong'.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: 106.686102 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

constraints.inter-dependency: longitude, search_type: longitude must not be provided if search_type is not 'latlong'.

parameters.name: categories_filter
parameters.description: The id returned by .../filters/list API, separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : price::9-40,free_cancellation::1,class::1,class::0,class::2

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: One of the followings : popularity|distance|class_descending|class_ascending|deals|review_score|price

parameters.name: children_age
parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma

parameters.name: children_qty
parameters.description: The number of children

parameters.name: search_id
parameters.description: Pass 'none' or value returned right in this API. You need to pass this parameter to get 'offset' working

constraints.inter-dependency: search_id, offset: search_id must be provided to use offset.

parameters.name: languagecode
parameters.description: One of the followings : en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw
